org.jetel.util

Class ReadableChannelIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.ReadableChannelIterator

  • public class ReadableChannelIterator
extends java.lang.Object
    Supports a field/dictionary reading and reading from urls. FYI alternative implementation of the same algorithm is in SourceIterator

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        !!!returns!!! true - if the source contains data OR if the input port is NOT eof, then it is necessary to call the method next() that returns null or an input stream. false - no input data TODO to make hasData method for the InputPort that waits for new data if the edge is empty. Is it good solution???
